segments.text: Good afternoon , miss , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ d like to buy this dress , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s certainly a pretty dress . I can ring you up at the register over here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you be paying by cash , check , or credit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to use a credit card . Do you take Discover ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , no . We only take MasterCard or Visa .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll put it on my Visa card , then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well , ma ’ am . Oh , there seems to be a problem , it says it ’ s rejected .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There must be something wrong with the system . Try my MasterCard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . Thank you . Yes , it seems to be working fine . Your total is $ 199.00 , sign here , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you go , and here ’ s your receipt . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . You have a good one , too .
segments.speaker: S2
